snippet: A film shown Tuesday on the state-owned Rossiya 1 channel claimed to have found the mastermind behind the Pussy Riot controversy: Boris Berezovsky, the exiled Russian tycoon living in London.
abstract: A film shown Tuesday on the state-owned Rossiya 1 channel claimed to have found the mastermind behind the Pussy Riot controversy: Boris Berezovsky, the exiled Russian tycoon living in London.

headline.main: Russian State TV Claims Exiled Tycoon Behind Pussy Riot
